attributes.action: to make all MPs live on a council estate within their constituencies during their time in office if possible
attributes.additional_details: During an MPs time in office they should live in a council estate within their constituency if there is one. Otherwise said MP should live in the most modest area of their constituency. This will bring MPs into direct contact with the people who they represent on a daily basis. Helping to give them a true insight into the people who elect them into office.
